definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Their extremely low temperatures can produce cryogenic burns of the skin and freeze underlying tissue.
sentences.chinese: 它們的超低溫會造成皮膚凍傷和皮下組織凍結。

sentences.english: The so-called black eye is caused by bleeding beneath the skin around the eye .
sentences.chinese: 所謂的眼部淤青是由於眼睛周圍的皮下出血而引起的。

sentences.english: Palpebral subcutaneous round mass with different sizes.
sentences.chinese: 眼瞼皮下圓形質塊，大小不一。

sentences.english: As you peel away the onion skin,you will find another skin underneath.
sentences.chinese: 你剝去洋蔥皮時，你會發現皮下還有皮。

sentences.english: Both of the muscular-skin branches anastomosed under the skin.
sentences.chinese: 兩者肌皮支在皮下相吻合。

sentences.english: Full-thickness skin flaps should be maintained while dissecting through the subcutaneous tissues.
sentences.chinese: 在解剖皮下組織時應進行全厚皮瓣的分離。

sentences.english: On day 28, the sarcoma tumors under the skin were recovered from the mice and weighed.
sentences.chinese: 在第28天時，皮下腫瘤從老鼠身上取出並且稱重。

sentences.english: Treatment generally consists of IV or sub-cutaneous fluids and antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 治療通常包括IV或者皮下注射和抗生素。

sentences.english: Hypodermic needles stuck in my shoes as I walked over to take the photo.
sentences.chinese: 當我步行去拍攝時，皮下注射的針頭扎進了我的鞋子。

sentences.english: The rats of normal control group were also subcutaneously injected the saline solution with the same dosage.
sentences.chinese: 正常對照組同法皮下注射相應劑量生理鹽水。

sentences.english: Stem cells were mobilized with granulocyte colony-stimulating factor from HLA-identical sibling donors.
sentences.chinese: 供者採用粒細胞集落刺激因子皮下注射動員幹細胞。

sentences.english: Objective To establish an subcutaneous xenotransplanted tumor model of human ameloblastoma in nude mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立人成釉細胞瘤的裸鼠皮下移植瘤模型。

sentences.english: The tumors usually grow dendrically towards the lipids of dermis.
sentences.chinese: 瘤組織常向皮下脂肪呈樹枝狀浸潤性生長。

sentences.english: The skin and the tissue beneath it literally freeze.
sentences.chinese: 該部位的皮膚和皮下組織於是隨之結凍。

sentences.english: Rongchang pig's adipocyte hypertrophy function in subcutaneous adipocyte cells was stronger than in DLY pig's.
sentences.chinese: 榮昌豬皮下脂肪細胞的肥大作用強於DLY豬。

sentences.english: Methods Compare 2 kinds of methods, and observe the subcutaneous hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 方法應用“2種方法”的比較，觀察皮下出血的例次。

definition: growth (of organism)/proliferation/supernumerary candidate (in imperial examation system)
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
